metadata.Title: CVE-2021-22902 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: The actionpack ruby gem (a framework for handling and responding to webrequests in Rails) before 6.0.3.7, 6.1.3.2 suffers from a possible denialof service vulnerability in the Mime type parser of Action Dispatch.Carefully crafted Accept headers can cause the mime type parser in ActionDispatch to do catastrophic backtracking in the regular expression engine.

criterions.comment: rails: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
